title: Bittercap Mushrooms

properties.name: description
properties.value: Bittercap mushrooms are mushrooms that may be grown with the Farming skill. Level 53 farmers may grow a bittercap mushroom by planting a mushroom spore in a mushroom patch using a seed dibber. Players cannot pay nearby farmers to protect their mushroom patch.

Bittercap mushrooms are mushrooms that may be grown with the Farming skill. Level 53 farmers may grow a bittercap mushroom by planting a mushroom spore in a mushroom patch using a seed dibber. Players cannot pay nearby farmers to protect their mushroom patch.

A mushroom spore will take up to 4 hours to mature. Once mature, the mushroom produces six mushrooms at a time. The mushroom does not regrow after being fully harvested. Having an attas plant growing in the anima patch makes it possible to harvest more than six mushrooms per spore.

Planting a mushroom spore in a mushroom patch grants 61.5 Farming experience. Players can only harvest the patch after that granting 57.7 Farming experience each.

'''Bittercap mushrooms''' are mushrooms that may be grown with the [[Farming]] [[skill]]. Level 53 farmers may grow a bittercap mushroom by planting a [[mushroom spore]] in a [[mushroom patch]] using a [[seed dibber]]. Players cannot pay nearby farmers to protect their mushroom patch.

A mushroom spore will take up to 4 hours to mature. Once mature, the mushroom produces six [[mushroom]]s at a time. The mushroom does not regrow after being fully harvested. Having an [[attas plant]] growing in the [[anima patch]] makes it possible to harvest more than six mushrooms per spore. 

Planting a mushroom spore in a mushroom patch grants 61.5 Farming [[experience]]. Players can only harvest the patch after that granting 57.7 Farming experience each.
